item.title: Paying attention
item.media:description:
Description: Stark wants to go to sleep, Yammy doesn't understand, Barnum might be hard of hearing{He's old}, Grimmjow doesn't give a crap, Halibel is ignoring Aizen, Aporro's deciding what experiment to do next, #'s 7 and 9 no one cares if they are listening or not. Yep, only Ulquiorra is listening.
Comments: 24
Kudos: 1
item.author: GJsoldier

item.title: Hitsugaya\'s Dream
item.media:description:
Description: Go Hitsugaya!!!

I'd hate to be in the same room as Hitsugaya when Matsumoto wakes him up from this wonderful, wonderful dream.

FYI For those who don't know, Zaraki is one of the tallest characters in Bleach, and so is Chad/Ichigo. And Hitsugaya is towering above them all......

The outer space look was intended to make it clear that it was a DREAM, sorry taichou but you'll have to grow up the hard way
Comments: 7
Kudos: 0
item.author: hitsugayatshiro
